summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning for the Pike/Pine Overlay District; adding a new Section 23.73.012 relating to anti-displacement measures associated with the use of affordable housing incentives in the District, and amending Sections 23.54.015, 23.73.008, and 23.73.010 to clarify existing language regarding the use of the housing incentives and to make changes regarding the application of the height exception for mixed use structures.
committee: Landlord/Tenant and Land Use Re-referred to Land Use on 1/28/02.
